data.actual_result: The window will just load forever and you will get "Missing access" errors in the console
data.expected_result: It should generate an invite link to the second channel since you have permission to do
data.short_description: If you don't have permission to generate an invite link to the default channel the "Invite people" modal will load forever
data.steps_to_repro: - Create 2 channels - Put a channel at the top - Revoke "Generate invite links" permission on the top channel - Allow "Generate invite links" permission on the second channel - Click on the server name then "Invite People"
